content: With the Fine China Tea Bowl equipped, your stamina recovery rate will moderately increase, making it easily one of the best Curios items in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fine_China_Tea_Bowl.md', within the main section titled 'Fine China Tea Bowl'.
The content is as follows:
With the Fine China Tea Bowl equipped, your stamina recovery rate will moderately increase, making it easily one of the best Curios items in the game.
